ActorTalk: For a human, your performance was excellent.
If it weren't for you, [PlayerName], Kuroro Coffee would've ended up in those thugs' hands.
Thank you for protecting this cafe, and the dreams it embodies, [PlayerName].
Oh, right! I haven't forgotten. You've earned it.
Drop by Kuroro Coffee whenever you have time.
(Seems like everything's okay for now. Keep up the good work, Manager Ross.)
Thanks for your help with the business.
By the way... about that cut you promised me?
